name: The Abbot
briefDescription: Deva sent to protect Krezk who has fallen into madness. Creator of the Mongrelfolk and the Flesh Golem Vasilka

name: Adrian Martikov
briefDescription: Wereraven Son of Davian Martikov and worker at Wizard of Wines

name: Alenka
location: Villiage of Barovia: Blood of the Vine Tavern (E2)
briefDescription: One of three female Vistani co-owners of the Blood of the Vine Tavern in the Villiage of Barovia

name: Alexei
briefDescription: Young Vistana man from the camp southwest of Vallaki. Beaten by Luvash for allowing Arabelle to be taken

name: Amalthia
briefDescription: Wachterhaus maid

name: Anastrasya Karelova
briefDescription: Former Bride of Strahd, buried within Strahd's Tomb

name: Anna Krezkova
briefDescription: Wife of Burgomaster Dmitri Krezkov. Described as "fearless". Grieving over the death of her last child Ilya

name: Arabelle (Tempter)
briefDescription: Seven-year-old Vistana girl. Daughter of Luvash. Kidnapped by Bluto Krogarov

name: Ariel du Plumette
briefDescription: Mad ghost of a failed inventor who dreamed of flying. Will attempt to possess a PC and throw himself from a great height

name: Arik Lorensk
location: Villiage of Barovia: Blood of the Vine Tavern (E2)
briefDescription: Bartender of Blood of the Vine Tavern in the Villiage of Barovia

name: Arrigal (Horseman)
briefDescription: Vistani assassin employed by Strahd. Will attempt to steal from or even kill party members

name: Aziana
briefDescription: Werewolf guard assigned to watch the entrance of the den

name: Baba Lysaga
location: Ruins of Berez: Baba Lysaga's Hut (U3)
briefDescription: Crazed old woman who believes herself to be Strahd's true mother. Will kill anyone who she sees as a threat to Strahd

name: Bella Sunbane
briefDescription: Daughter of Morgantha the hag and is one-third of the hag coven in the Old Bonegrinder. Kidnaps children to grind their bones into powder for baking dream pastries

name: Beucephalus
briefDescription: Strahd's beloved nightmare steed

name: Bianca
briefDescription: White-haired werewolf deep within the den. Kiril Stoyanovich's mate

name: Bildrath Cantemir
briefDescription: Owner and proprietor of Bildrath's Mercantile in the Villiage of Barovia

name: Bluto Krogarov
briefDescription: Drunken and destitute fisherman from Vallaki. Kidnaps Arabelle and attempts to sacrifice her to the lake in exchange for fish

name: Bray Martikov
briefDescription: Nine-year-old son of Danika and Urwin. Scampers about the inn and easily gets underfoot

name: Brom Martikov
briefDescription: Eleven-year-old son of Danika and Urwin. Scampers about the inn and easily gets underfoot

name: Cladiu Martikov
briefDescription: Teenage son of Stefania and Dag. Grandson of Davian Martikov

name: Clovin Belview (Marionette)
briefDescription: Two-headed mongrelfolk musician. Tasked by the Abbot with feeding and caring for his mongrelfolk bretheren

name: Cyrus Belview
briefDescription: Faithful mongrelfolk servant to Strahd. Will try to lure the party into the elevator trap (K61).

name: Dag Tomescu
briefDescription: Married to Stefania Martikova. Son-in-law of Davian Martikov

name: Dimira Yolensky
briefDescription: Pregnant woman from Krezk. Gives birth to souless child ("Something New" Event)

name: Dmitri Krezkov
briefDescription: Burgomaster of Krezk. Grieving over the death of his last child Ilya

name: Donavich (Broken One)
briefDescription: Priest of the Villiage of Barovia. Spends his days praying for the salvation of his son Doru

name: Doru
briefDescription: Son of Donavich. Turned into a Vampire Spawn by Strahd during the Mad Mage's failed attack on Ravenloft

name: Danika Dorakova
briefDescription: Barkeep and co-owner of the Blue Water Inn. Wife of Urwin Martikov. Member of the Keepers of the Feather

name: Davanka
briefDescription: Werewolf guard assigned to watch the entrance of the den

name: Davian Martikov (Raven)
briefDescription: Owner of the Wizard of Wines and Patriarch of the Martikov Family.

name: Dhavit
briefDescription: Wachterhaus cook

name: Drusilla
briefDescription: Rictavio's horse. Described as a traveling companion by Rictavio's false journal

name: Elvir Martikov
briefDescription: Wereraven Son of Davian Martikov and worker at Wizard of Wines

name: Emil Toranescu
briefDescription: Former leader of the werewolves in Barovia. Ousted by Kiril and imprisoned by Strahd

name: Endorovich the Terrible
statblockAlterations: HP 77x2; His spirit inhabits one gargoyle at a time
briefDescription: Spirit of a long-dead warlord. Fights the party by inhabiting the gargoyles within his crypt

name: Ernst Larnak
briefDescription: Money-grubbing spy employed by Fiona Wachter

name: Escher
briefDescription: Vampire companion to Strahd. Described as a "handsome young man

name: Exethanter
briefDescription: Once a powerful lich lord of the Amber Temple. Now weakened and decrepit (can be restored with greater restoration)

name: Ezmerelda d'Avenir (Mists)
location: Ravenloft, Argynvostholt, Krezk, Van Richten's Tower (K, Q, S, V)
briefDescription: Heavily armed Vistana vampire hunter. Apprenticed under Rudolph van Richten, now searching Barovia for her master

name: Fiona Wachter
briefDescription: Vallakian noblewoman and cult leader. Wants to sieze control of Vallaki from the Vallakoviches

name: Franz Groza
location: Werewolf Den: Leader of the Pack Event
briefDescription: Young but fierce" werewolf who will take over leadership of the pack if Emil and Kiril are both killed.

name: Gadof Blinsky
briefDescription: Struggling toymaker of Vallaki, and source of most toys in Barovia. Forced by Izek Strazni to make Ireena Kolyana dolls

name: Gertruda
briefDescription: Naive young girl from the villiage of Barovia. Ran away from home to be with Strahd

name: Godfrey Gwilym (Ghost)
briefDescription: High ranking member of the Order of the Silver Dragon. Former lover of Vladimir Horngaard

name: Gunther Arasek
briefDescription: Co-owner of the Arasek Stockyard. Married to Yelena

name: Haliq
briefDescription: Wachterhaus valet

name: Helga Ruvak
briefDescription: Vampire spawn of Strahd. Will pretend to be a helpless maid to gain the party's trust before attacking them ("Maid in Hell")

name: Helwa
briefDescription: Leader of a small hunting party of berserkers taking shelter in the Amber Temple

name: Henrik van der Voort
briefDescription: Reclusive and disliked coffin maker from Vallaki. Paid by Vasili von Holtz (Strahd) to hide coffins containing Vampire Spawn

name: Ireena Kolyana (Innocent)
briefDescription: Adopted daughter of the burgomaster of the Villiage of Barovia. Reincarnation of Tatyana, Strahd's unrequited love interest from centuries ago

name: Ismark Kolyanovich (Executioner)
location: Villiage of Barovia: Blood of the Vine Tavern (E2)
briefDescription: Son of the late burgomaster of the Villiage of Barovia, known as "Ismark the Lesser". Brother of Ireena Kolyana

name: Izek Stranzi
briefDescription: Bloodthirsty guard leader of Vallaki. Severed right arm replaced with fiendish arm a few months ago. Real brother of Ireena Kolyana

name: Karl Wachter
briefDescription: Troublemaking son of Fiona Wachter. Brother of Nikolai Jr.

name: Kasimir Velikov (Seer)
briefDescription: Crippled Dusk Elf living among the Vistani near Vallaki. Wracked with guilt over his centuries-old murder of his sister, Patrina Velikovna

name: Kellen
briefDescription: Young werewolf recently welcomed into the pack. Kidnapped and forced to fight to the death in the ring of stone (Z8) against other child captives.

name: Kiril Stoyanovich
briefDescription: Cruel current leader of the werewolf pack. Recently took over leadership of the pack by allying with Strahd to oust Emil, the former leader

name: Klutz Tripalotsky (Ghost)
briefDescription: Ancient phantom warrior who died by falling upon his own sword. Lived and died long before the days of Strahd

name: Kolya
briefDescription: Crazed Vistani courier who brings a mysterious coffin to the entrance of Argynvostholt ("Special Delivery" Event)

name: Kretyana Dolvof
briefDescription: Krezkian midwife who identifies a newborn baby as soulless ("Something New" Event)

name: Kroval "Mad Dog" Grislek
briefDescription: Spirit of an old warleader. His crypt is guarded by his wraith as well as three hell hounds

name: Lazlo Ulrich
briefDescription: Deceased burgomaster of Berez. Killed along with his city for murdering his daughter Marina, preventing Strahd from claiming her

name: Lars Kjurls
location: Vallaki: Festival of the Blazing Sun Event
briefDescription: Vallakian guard who laughs at the burgomaster during the Festival of the Blazing Sun. He is tied up and dragged through town as punishment

name: Lief Lipsiege
briefDescription: Strahd's accountant, chained to his own desk.

name: Lucian Petrovich
briefDescription: Priest of Vallaki. Preaches nightly to terrified Vallakians, trying to comfort them. Targeted for death by Strahd in the "Feast of St. Andral" Event

name: Ludmilla Vilisevic
briefDescription: Former Bride of Strahd, buried within Strahd's Tomb

name: Luvash
briefDescription: Brutish co-leader of the Vistani Camp near Vallaki. Brother of Arrigal and father of Arabelle

name: Lydia Petrovna
briefDescription: Long-suffering wife of Burgomaster Vargas Vallakovich. Agrees with his every word, even at the cost of her own sanity.

name: Majesto
briefDescription: Lady Fiona Wachter's summoned Imp

name: Madalena
briefDescription: Wachterhaus maid

name: Madam Eva
briefDescription: Elderly Vistana fortuneteller. Traded her youth to Mother Night in exchange for magical foresight and long life. Daughter of Lord Barov and half-sister to Strahd and Sergei. Her real name is Katarina

name: Mad Mage of Mt. Baratok (Broken One)
briefDescription: Powerful wizard from a distant land. Traveled to Barovia to destroy Strahd, but was defeated and driven mad. His true identity is Mordenkainen, legendary archmage of the Circle of Eight

name: Mad Mary
location: Villiage of Barovia: Mad Mary's House (E3)
briefDescription: Grieving mother found weeping in her home in the Villiage of Barovia. She is distraught over her runaway daughter, Gertruda.

name: Martin Martikov
briefDescription: Young wereraven boy from the Wizard of Wines. Son of Stefania and Dag and grandson of Davian

name: Marzena Belview
briefDescription: Winged Mongrelfolk in the Abbey of St. Markovia. Chained to the ground and will not allow anyone other than Clovin Belview to approach her. Sister of Mishka Belview

name: Milivoj
briefDescription: Groundskeeper and gravedigger of St. Andral's Church. Steals the bones of St. Andral and gives them to Henrik van der Voort

name: Mirabel
location: Villiage of Barovia: Blood of the Vine Tavern (E2)
briefDescription: One of three female Vistani co-owners of the Blood of the Vine Tavern in the Villiage of Barovia

name: Mishka Belview
briefDescription: Murderous spider-like mongrelfolk hiding in the well in the Abbey of St. Markovia. He has discovered that he likes killing people. Brother of Marzena Belview.

name: Morgantha
location: Old Bonegrinder (or in Villiage of Barovia)
briefDescription: Mother of Bella Sunbane and Offalia Wormwiggle. Leader of the hag coven in the Old Bonegrinder. Kidnaps children to grind their bones into powder for baking dream pastries

name: Muriel Vinshaw
briefDescription: Wereraven scout watching Baba Lysaga's hut from afar. Warns the party of the danger of facing Baba head on

name: Neferon
briefDescription: Arcanaloth hiding within the Amber Temple. Attacks the party from within the faceless god statue. Will claim to be a human wizard named "Henrich Stolt" if captured

name: Nikolai Wachter Sr. (Horseman)
briefDescription: Deceased husband of Fiona Wachter and father of Karl, Nikolai Jr. and Stella. His body is kept pristine by Fiona by use of gentle repose

name: Nikolai Wachter Jr.
briefDescription: Troublemaking son of Fiona Wachter. Brother of Karl

name: Offalia Wormwiggle
briefDescription: Daughter of Morgantha the hag and is one-third of the hag coven in the Old Bonegrinder. Kidnaps children to grind their bones into powder for baking dream pastries

name: Otto Belview
briefDescription: Mongrelfolk gate guard of the Abbey of St. Markovia. His madness is embodied by "I am the smartest, wisest, strongest, fastest, and most beautiful person I know

name: Parrywimple (Innocent)
briefDescription: Simple-minded stock boy in Bildrath's Mercantile. Used by his uncle Bildrath as a bouncer for any difficult customers. Real name is Parpol Cantemir

name: Patrina Velikovna
briefDescription: Long-dead dusk elf wizard, killed by her own people to prevent her from being corrupted by Strahd. Trapped in her crypt in the form of a Banshee. Her brother Kasimir seeks to resurrect her with the power of the Amber Temple

name: Piccolo
briefDescription: Pet monkey belonging to Gadof Blinsky. Originally owned by Rictavio, who gave him to Blinsky because pets are not allowed in the Blue Water Inn

name: Pidlwick II (Marionette)
briefDescription: Clockwork replica of the jester Pidlwick created by legendary toymakter Fritz von Weerg. Killed the original Pidlwick by pushing him down a flight of stairs

name: Rahadin
briefDescription: Sadistic chamberlain to the von Zarovich family for centuries. Unwavering in loyalty to Strahd

name: Rictavio (Artifact)
briefDescription: Half-Elf bard and carnival man from a distant land who spends most days telling outrageous and implausable stories of his adventures. His true identity is the legendary vampire hunter Rudolph van Richten

name: Sangzor
statblockAlterations: 6 INT; 33 HP; resistant to nonmagical weapons
briefDescription: Legendary monster from the Balinok mountains. May attack anyone traveling along the Tsolenka Pass

name: Sasha Ivliskova
briefDescription: Former Bride of Strahd, locked within a crypt after Strahd became bored of her

name: Savid
briefDescription: Dusk Elf scout sent to find Arabelle. Took refuge within Argynvostholt after being attacked by blights

name: Skennis
briefDescription: Weak werewolf who has grown too old to hunt. Plays his electrum flute (poorly) to pass the time

name: Sorvia
location: Villiage of Barovia: Blood of the Vine Tavern (E2)
briefDescription: One of three female Vistani co-owners of the Blood of the Vine Tavern in the Villiage of Barovia

name: Stefania Martikova
briefDescription: Daughter of Davian Martikov. Mother of four living in the Wizard of Wines

name: Stella Wachter (Donjon)
briefDescription: Crazed daughter of Fiona Wachter. Driven mad by Victor Vallakovich's "unkind words" after she tried to befriend and wed Victor on her mother's orders. Now spends her days locked within her room, believing she is a cat

name: Strahd von Zarovich
location: Castle Ravenloft, or anywhere in Barovia
briefDescription: Vampire lord over all of Barovia. The main antagonist and final boss of Curse of Strahd

name: Szoldar Szoldarovich
briefDescription: Wolf-hunter of Vallaki. Spends his free time drowning his misery at the Blue Water Inn rather than spend time with his family. Hunting partners with Yevgeni Krushkin

name: Udo Lukovich
briefDescription: Poor shoemaker of Vallaki. Imprisoned by Burgomaster Vallakovich for speaking out against him

name: Urwin Martikov
briefDescription: Head cook and co-owner of the Blue Water Inn. Husband of Danika Dorakova and estranged son of Davian Martikov. Member of the Keepers of the Feather

name: Vargas Vallakovich
briefDescription: Egotistical burgomaster of Vallaki. Frequently holds ridiculous festivals which he claims ward off Strahd's evil. Brutally persecutes anyone who dares criticize his leadership

name: Vasilka (Tempter)
briefDescription: Flesh Golem created by the Abbot as a bride to give to Strahd. Made to look like Strahd's ancient love interest Tatyana

name: Victor Vallakovich (Donjon)
briefDescription: Skittish son of burgomaster Vargas Vallakovich. Found a spellbook in his father's library and is trying to create a teleport circle in order to escape Barovia

name: Vilnius
briefDescription: Cowardly wizard apprentice dragged to Barovia by his greedy master Jakarion. He is hiding away after he suffered terrible burns and his master was disintegrated.

name: Viggo Martikov
briefDescription: Young wereraven boy from the Wizard of Wines. Son of Stefania and Dag and grandson of Davian

name: Vladimir Horngaard
briefDescription: Former commander of the Order of the Silver Dragon. Blinded by rage, he will not allow anyone to destroy Strahd, which he would see as freeing Strahd from his suffering

name: Volenta Popofsky
briefDescription: Former Bride of Strahd, buried within Strahd's Tomb

name: Wensencia
briefDescription: Werewolf watching over young Kellen, the newest member of the pack.

name: Willemina Rikalova
briefDescription: Mother of the imprisoned Vallakian shoemaker Udo Lukovich. She spends every night at the Church of St. Andral, praying and pleading with Father Lucian for her son's return

name: Wintersplinter
briefDescription: Massive tree blight summoned by druids of Yester Hill using the Wizard of Wines magic seed. Set loose to wreak havoc on the Wizard of Wines once summoned

name: Yeska
briefDescription: Orphaned altar boy of the Church of St. Andral. Assistant to Father Lucian

name: Yelena Arasek
briefDescription: Co-owner of the Arasek Stockyard. Married to Gunther

name: Yevgeni Krushkin
briefDescription: Wolf-hunter of Vallaki. Spends his free time drowning his misery at the Blue Water Inn rather than spend time with his family. Hunting partners with Szoldar Szoldarovich

name: Yolanda Martikova
briefDescription: Infant wereraven from the Wizard of Wines. Daughter of Stefania and Dag and granddaughter of Davian

name: Zuleika Toranescu (Beast)
location: Werewolf Den: Shrine of Mother Night (Z7)
briefDescription: Vengeful mate of Emil, the former leader of the werewolf pack. She will help the party in exchange for Emil's freedom or for Kiril's death

name: Zygfrek Belview
briefDescription: Mongrelfolk gate guard of the Abbey of St. Markovia. Her madness is embodied by "I don't like the way people judge me all the time
